metadata.title: CVE-2024-2756 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
__Host-/__Secure- cookie bypass due to partial CVE-2022-31629 fix

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php8.2 - 8.2.10-2ubuntu2.1
libphp8.2-embed - 8.2.10-2ubuntu2.1
php8.2 - 8.2.10-2ubuntu2.1
php8.2-bcmath - 8.2.10-2ubuntu2.1
php8.2-bz2 - 8.2.10-2ubuntu2.1
php8.2-cgi - 8.2.10-2ubuntu2.1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: php8.2 package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.2.10-2ubuntu2.1').
